title: NightmareCity: Concrete Nightmares
script: The subway rumbles beneath your feet, but it's not the trains you hear. {location} hides {secret}. {warning}. Between {mundane_object} and {mundane_object}, {horror_element} waits. {threat}. Every street leads deeper into the maze. Every turn takes you further from home. The city breathes at night. Its breath smells of decay and forgotten dreams.
